publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community.
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Colin Campbell*

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Michael Matheson*, Alasdair Morgan*, Tommy Sheridan*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Robin Harper*
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Russell*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Russell, Mr Adam Ingram

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Russell, Mr Adam Ingram
S1M-359 Greengairs: Environmental Award (lodged on 7 December 1999) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Russell, Mr Adam Ingram, Dorothy-Grace Elder

S1M-359 Mr Gil Paterson: Greengairs: Environmental Award—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Greengairs for being awarded the Friends of the Earth International Award for supporting and taking action to protect the environment of the community. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Fiona Hyslop, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Russell, Mr Adam Ingram, Dorothy-Grace Elder
